maqras.text: And young male servants who are like hidden pearl go around them for (serving) them
And they turn to each other asking one another
they say: indeed we were afraid among our people in the past
but God favored upon us and protected us from the punishment of scorching wind
Indeed we used to call on Him in the past. Indeed He is the good, the merciful
So remind (them) that by your Master’s favor you are not a fortune-teller or a madman
Or do they say: a poet, we wait for his time of misfortune (his death)
Say: wait and I wait with you
Or does their imagination (and dreams) order them to this, or are they disobedient people
Or they say he made it up? No, but they do not believe
So let them bring a saying like it (Quran), if they are truthful
Or were they created from nothing, or are they the creators
Or did they create the skies and the earth? No, they are not certain
Or are the treasures of their Master with them, or are they in charge (of them)
Or do they have a ladder that they listen by it? Then their listeners should bring a clear reason
Or does He have the daughters and you have the sons
Or do you ask them for a wage, and they are weighed down by the debt
Or is the unseen with them, and they write it
Or do they want to plot? But those who disbelieved are plotted against
Or do they have a god other than God? God is flawless of what they associate (with Him)
And if they see a piece of the sky falling down, they say: piled up clouds
So leave them until they meet their day, in which they are thunderstruck (and die)
A day that their plot is of no use to them at all, and they are not helped
And indeed for those who did wrong there is a punishment other than this, but most of them do not know
And be patient for your Master’s command, as you are under Our eyes, and glorify your Master with praise when you get up
And glorify Him part of the night and when the stars disappear
By the star when it goes down
your companion is not misguided and he was not deceived
And he does not speak from the desire
It (Quran) is not but a revelation that is revealed
The very powerful (Gabriel) taught him
being strong, he stood firmly
And he was at the higher horizon
then he came closer and he came down
until he was at a distance of two bows or closer
then he revealed to His servant what he revealed
His (the prophet’s) heart did not deny what he saw
Do you argue with him about what he sees
And he has certainly seen him in another descent
By the Lote (Sidra) tree at the utmost boundary
Next to it is garden of the residence
When that which covers covered the Lote (Sidra) tree
The eye did not turn aside and did not outreach
He has certainly seen some of the great signs of His Master
What do you think of the Lat, the Uzza
and Manat, the third one (of them)
Are the males for you and the females for Him
That is an unfair division

They are only names which you and your fathers named it, whereas God did not send down any reason for it? They only follow the guess and what the souls desires, while the guidance has certainly come to them from their Master
Or does the human being have whatever he desire
While the last (the hereafter) and the first (this world) belongs to God
